get.summary: Retrieves the JSON data of a specific world by its name.
get.description: </br>Parameters:</br>    world_name (str): The name of the world to retrieve the data for.</br></br>Returns:</br>    dict: A JSON object containing the data of the specified world.</br></br>Raises:</br>    404: If the specified world does not exist.

loc.title: Location
loc.description: the error's location as a list.

msg.title: Message
msg.description: a computer-readable identifier of the error type.

type_.title: Error Type
type_.description: a human readable explanation of the error.

ctx.title: Error context
ctx.description: an optional object which contains values required to render the error message.
